desc: 공격 시 HC의 드랍율 대폭   증가

dictionary.lore: An odd device made from an optimized Cure Gizmo. By modifying the output limiter on the chest in front of the heart, this upgraded piece helps its user to ease comfortably through battles. It is unknown as to how this incredibly intricate piece was developed, and also why it was found in the La Veda Republic.

name: 유보 하트 부스터2
